Posts.Content: SuzieQAU51 wrote: Hi...I just found out last Thursday the I have Invasive DCIS....not having surgery till 1st July.....how do you stop the shaking all over and how do you get rid of the taste in your mouth?  I am trying to be very positive and found this web site wonderful.....thank you all.....I am looking forward to keeping in touch with you all as I go through this Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just told last Thursday...I am in Australia SuzieQAU51 trame

Posts.Content: Jun 24, 2009 11:54PM SuzieQAU51 wrote: Hi trame,   thank you for your wise advise and just taking the time to talk to me.....I haven't seen the surgeon yet, will do so on Monday .....so still to be discussed.....they can have it all as far as I am concerned.....breast fed all my 4 babies years ago.....now they have babies....so I don 't need them......it is so good to be able to chat here and talk with other women ....it has made be feel calmer
Posts.Title: Just told last Thursday...I am in Australia SuzieQAU51 trame
